response.overview: This is a documentary about the 3 clumsy workers of a small family insurance agency. They are all in their late 50's, chubby bold, bearded with massive glasses, and though they are kind, easy going, sensitive and broad minded gentlemen, they know nothing about business and are on a verge of bankruptcy in any aspect of life. The film documents their survival attempt during the 2008's economical crisis.
response.title: החברה הכי גרועה בעולם
